response.overview: Fiona (Fiona Frost) secretly gets-off fantasizing about her sexy Stepfather (Jason Sarcinelli), all the while unaware that he’s in another room fantasizing about her. One evening Fiona’s in bed, fresh from fingering herself, when Jason sneaks into her room, his cock already hard. Fiona appears to be asleep as he stares at his beautiful Stepdaughter to fuel his masturbatory fantasies. The stud-of-a-Stepdad can resist no longer and does the unthinkable – he climbs into bed with his Stepdaughter. That risky move is the beginning of their unspoken affair as their boldness grows with each passing night…
response.title: He Comes at Night
